citation: Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Heavy Vehicle Charges) Act 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Heavy Vehicle Charges) Act 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(2) of the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Heavy Vehicle Charges) Act 2012 fix 1 December 2012 as the day on which section 4 of that Act commences.

15 October 2012

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. J. O'BYRNE

Minister for Infrastructure

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 October 2012

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
